https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/73bsF0mZBRHmZW0T9cvwt3hblgJ.jpg The real story of the journalist Vesela Toteva (in the role is her daughter -Valentina Karoleva) searching for her own happiness during the dynamic and uncertain 90's in Bulgaria. A tale about drugs, fall, fear and redemption. A Dose of Happiness
